author: CTPPS
body:
Splitting the PR 24420 into separate pieces. This one includes:
PPSTools - package with utils used by Fulll and Fast simulation and Fast reconstruction 

SimTransport - new interface adding TOTEM parameterization (together with Hector) and consolidating the PPS proton transport started in Jan, 2017. 
FastSimulation/CTPPS* : adapting the PPS fast simulation to the new transport.
title: PPSTools and pps Fastsim with new proton transport with Totem parameterization
